---
title: "CEC and AEC Figure Gen."
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
library(lubridate)
library(ggpubr)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(cowplot)

```

```{r}
# LN_SED Base Case\

# Update File

source("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Code/LN_SED/Base/CEC_Mutator.R")
source("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Code/Functions/Grapher_CEC_AEC.R")

setwd("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Manuscript/Images/LN_SED/Base")

CEC_All<-read.csv2("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Output/Calibration/Output_LN_SED/Edited Data/CEC_All.csv", header=TRUE)
CEC_All$group_id<-as.factor(CEC_All$group_id)

CEC_All$Date<-as.Date(CEC_All$Date)

CEC_Ca<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$Ca)
Ca<-CEC_Ca+labs(y="Ca on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

CEC_Mg<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$Mg)
Mg<-CEC_Mg+labs(y="Mg on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

CEC_K<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$K)
K<-CEC_K+labs(y="K on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

CEC_Na<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$Na)
Na<-CEC_Na+labs(y="Na on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

CEC_Al<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$Al)
Al<-CEC_Al+labs(y="Al on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

CEC_NH4<-CEC_Grapher(CEC_All$NH4)
NH4<-CEC_NH4+labs(y="NH4 on cation exchange surfaces (kg/ha)", color="Layer Number")+ scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+ scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y")+theme_bw()

ggarrange(Ca, Mg, K, labels=c("A", "B", "C"),ncol = 1, nrow = 3) %>%
  ggexport(filename="Test1.png", height=1000, width=650, res=95)

ggarrange(Na, Al, NH4, labels=c("A", "B", "C"),ncol = 1, nrow = 3) %>%
  ggexport(filename="Test2.png", height=1000, width=650, res=95)

```
